sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar :data="chartData" :options="chartOptions" />
</template>

<script>
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend
} from 'chart.js'
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

ChartJS.register(Title, Tooltip, Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale)

export default {
  name: 'BarChart',
  components: { Bar },
  props: {
    chartData: {
        type: Object,
        required: true
      },
    chartOptions: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {}
    }
  }
}
</script>
